page.title: 09 Improving Grafton Underwood
page.content: Recently there was a survey carried out among the residents of the village. It was about things people felt should be done. These are the results of things people felt very strongly about. 45 people wanted something done to protect the grass verges. 71 people felt very strongly that the speed limit should be reduced from 40 miles an hour (64 km per hour) to 30 miles an hour (48 km per hour). 42 people felt very strongly that there should be a play area for the children. 21 people felt very strongly that something should be done to prevent the stream from flooding onto the road after very heavy rainfall.
